subject: Fw: A shipment from order #SSN2753 has been delivered
description_text:
Hello, I recieved an order today that was supposed to contain Simsonn Plus X Throttle and Brake. As well as ordering the haptic motors. I did not receive the haptic motors at all. I did however recieve the pedal set. 
Please advise me on how we can fix this. As I would like the haptic set and not a refund.


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone


Begin forwarded message:

On Monday, October 6, 2025, 11:17 AM, SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> wrote:

conversations.body_text: Hi Colin McKeon,  We apologize for the delay. Here is your Haptics logistics tracking link. https://t.17track.net/zh-cn#nums=JSEIJ2911970573YQ
